posts.title: Why I've switched from WordPress to Next.js to create my personal website?
posts.summary: In the middle of 2021, I did some research to do a redesign of my personal website. This one was starting to get pretty old...

posts.title: OASIS PRO, CES Stimulation Medical Device
posts.summary: In 2022, my group members and I created a simulated stimulation medical device with QT. Working together we were able to implement all its features and displayed it through a graphical interface...
